attributes.action: Maria Miller should be sacked for her expenses debacle
attributes.additional_details: Maria Miller, first wrongly claimed expenses she wasn't entitled to claim and then bullied anyone trying to discover her false claims.  She voted for the Bedroom tax for anyone in social housing who had an additional bedroom and yet was claiming benefit, public money, for her own empty bedroom. This was a deliberate act and as a result she should be sacked and prosecuted as would happen to any member of the public if they acted in such a way.

rejection.details: This is party political matter and not for Government
